entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 07:53 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain overnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Local ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
